Text: to all those who have trouble figuring out how to play these movies, most 3d tvs have a usb input. these tvs come with built in video codecs. especially lg 3dtvs. all you have to do is load these movies on your favorite usb storage device, whether that be a flashdrive or external hdd. you have to have your drive formated for NTFS allocation. tested with multiple tvs and proven to work. my tv is a lg 3dtv, and will natively play almost all video formats including the highly coveted matroska(.mkv) files. good luck to all and enjoy!
